column5: Anyone know if shimano is still replacing corsairs with a corvalus?
what's this? I have a corsair I haven't used in a few years because it was junk. Are you saying I could trade it in for something that is less junk?
no the corvalus is junk too
No there replacing them with Calcutta TEs or LJVs, and throwing in a Loomis NRX for your troubles
They were doing it a few years ago. The silver ones for free and the gold ones for an extra 30 bucks. I think this is long since over though.

go figure. I have a silver one which I used for maybe one season when I first started musky fishing. Used it this past fall a bit for some vertical jigging. Real piece of junk. Made me remember why I retired it even when I was new to the sport
